name: Metrilus
tag_list: time-of-flight-camera, tof-camera, time-of-flight, mesa, pmd, fotonic, primesense, kinect, xtion, camcube, sr4000, -net-wrapper, sdk, pmd--net, fotonic--net, primesense--net, kinect--net, xtion--net, xtionpro--net, camcube--net, camboard, camboard--net, s
overview: In the beginning of 2010 Metrilus was founded as one of the first companies worldwide to provide a profound and complete solution for real-time 3-D imaging. Metrilus offers its customers tailored software for all kinds of applications within real-time 3-D imaging. This includes the support of a variety of 3-D acquisition modalities, including Time-of-Flight, Structured Light, Light Section and the combination of all these modalities for multi-camera setups. The software supports all major Time-of-Flight cameras and other popular devices, like Mesa Imaging Fotonic, PMD, ifm, Softkinetic, Microsoft Kinect and Asus Xtion.
